title: Ivo Staš
content:
Ivo Staš (born 10 February 1965) is a former Czech footballer who played as a defender.[1][2]

Staš signed for Aston Villa in 1991, but never played in any match due to an injury.[3] After ending his playing career, he did not stay with top football and moved to the United States.[4]

This biographical article related to association football in the Czech Republic, about a defender, is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
